description:
A simple score counter for the dice game "Tutto".
Tutto Counter is the perfect companion for your "Tutto" game nights. With this app, you can easily track and manage the scores for multiple players.

Features:
*   Add or remove any number of players.
*   Customize player names and colors.
*   Simple score entry with predefined values (e.g., for a street) and free input.
*   Game history is saved, so you can always see who got how many points and when.
*   Random player names from different categories (animals, cities, etc.).

The app is completely open source and respects your privacy.

License: GPLv3
Source Code: https://gitlab.com/gJsas/tutto-counter
